title: JSW Energy arm commissions 300 MW wind project
description: JSW Energy's subsidiary, JSW Renew Energy Two Ltd, has commissioned a 300 MW wind power plant in Tuticorin, Tamil Nadu. This project, awarded by Solar Energy Corporation of India (SECI), marks the company's first greenfield wind power plant for SECI. The total installed capacity now stands at 7,726 MW with ongoing projects expected to complete by FY 2025.
